titles.title: VA Supply Chain Management System Authorization Act
VA Supply Chain Management System Authorization Act
To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out an information technology system to manage supply chains for medical facilities of Department of Veterans Affairs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Technology Modernization.

bill.summary:
VA Supply Chain Management System Authorization Act
This bill authorizes the Department of Veterans Affairs to implement an information technology system for the management of supply chains only if the system meets specified requirements (e.g., is cloud based) and does not require the use of a specific contract to procure supplies.
